value:
$WmMPID_水着イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Swim20,Face|I may be out of my element,
but I won't lose here!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ドロテア,ch17_11_Dorothea_F_Swim20,Face|We won't be going easy on you
just because we're dressed for
the beach!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ローレンツ,ch17_20_Lorenz_M_Swim20,Face|Come on, then! Let me show
you how nobility fights.$k$p$WmMPID_水着シルヴァン,ch17_16_Sylvain_M_Swim20,Face|This'll be fun—but I won't
be playing around.$k$p$WmMPID_レア,ch17_01_Beleth_FF_Pair,Face|Allow me to join in as well.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ベレス|Right then. Let's go!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_水着シルヴァン,ch17_16_Sylvain_M_Swim20,Face|What are you doing crouched
down like that, Ingrid?$k$p$WmMPID_水着イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Swim20,Face|Gathering seashells! Since not all
of our classmates are here, I wanted
to bring them souvenirs.$k$pAnd these flowers... Maybe I can
press them between the pages
of a book?$k$p$WmMPID_水着シルヴァン,ch17_16_Sylvain_M_Swim20,Face|Hmm... Souvenirs, eh?$k$pI hate to say it, but they won't come
close to comparing to the great time
we've had in the sun.$k$p$WmMPID_水着イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Swim20,Face|You're right. These things won't
communicate an iota of the time
we've had here...$k$pBut it will still brighten their days...
Bring them a little hope, you know?$k$p$WmMPID_水着シルヴァン,ch17_16_Sylvain_M_Swim20,Face|...Hope?$k$p$WmMPID_水着イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Swim20,Face|Yes! Hope that such fantastic places
as this remain out in the world...$k$pHope that, someday, you'll find
yourself in just such a place.$k$pI know we're in the midst of a war.
But when there's peace again, I hope
we can all visit the beach together.$k$p$WmMPID_水着シルヴァン,ch17_16_Sylvain_M_Swim20,Face|Not a bad idea. I'll have to talk
to the summoner and make
a few arrangements...$k$pMaybe we can get all the Blue Lions
to come along next time.$k$p$WmMPID_水着イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Swim20,Face|What about everyone in the
other houses?$k$p$WmMPID_水着シルヴァン,ch17_16_Sylvain_M_Swim20,Face|Well, I guess the summoner'll have
to summon the whole academy!$k$p$WmMPID_水着イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Swim20,Face|Now you're talking.$k$pEven if it's not for years to come,
I hope we can all visit this place
together someday.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ドロテア,ch17_11_Dorothea_F_Swim20,Face|Ah! There you are. We've been
looking for you!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ローレンツ,ch17_20_Lorenz_M_Swim20,Face|The professor is trying to gather
everyone. She says she'll buy us
all a special iced treat.$k$p$WmMPID_水着イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Swim20,Face|I'm on my way!$k$p$WmMPID_水着シルヴァン,ch17_16_Sylvain_M_Swim20,Face|Sounds great! Oh, Lorenz, what
happened with that girl you were
talking to, by the way?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ローレンツ,ch17_20_Lorenz_M_Swim20,Face|Oh, that...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ドロテア,ch17_11_Dorothea_F_Swim20,Face|Hey, who wants to race back?
Winner gets first pick of flavors!$k$p$WmMPID_水着イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Swim20,Face|Oh, you're on. See you there!$k$p$Sbs150|
